author: costin
msg: Add a .classpath - only include resources. This is needed if you want to debug and run tomcat in eclipse.

author: costin
msg: Same - use the libs instead of servletapi

author: costin
msg: As I mentioned, the launcher doesn't work with the dir struct in servletapi
And most people won't modify servletapi anyway - so it is easier to just use the repository/,
and not even checkout servletapi ( unless you are in the expert group, etc ). It's also faster.

author: costin
msg: Rename to match the dir ( well, not the dir in svn - but the local one that build.xml expects )
